text: Jinjiazhuang Tunnel () or Jinjiazhuang Spiral Tunnel (), is the world's longest highway spiral tunnel. The spiral has a curve radius of and the elevation difference between the tunnel entrance and exit is . The tunnel and the Yanchong Expressway will form the main route from Beijing to the Yanqing cluster of the Beijing 2022 Winter Olympics. == References == Category:Transport in Hebei Category:Buildings and structures in Hebei Category:Road tunnels in China Category:Tunnels completed in 2019
title: Jinjiazhuang Tunnel
